title._content: Visitors Entering the Opening of the George Gustav Heye Center of the National Museum of the American Indian

description._content: Photographer: Martin Sarna Date: October 30, 1994 Type: Photographic print Standard number: SIA2011-1381 Summary: Visitors entering the Alexander Hamilton Customs House in New York City for the opening of the George Gustav Heye Center of the National Museum of the American Indian located there. The George Gustav Heye Center opened October 30, 1994. The 1907 Customs House is a Beaux Arts building designed by architect Cass Gilbert Persistent URL: siarchives.si.edu/collections/siris_sic_12962 Repository:Smithsonian Archives - History Div View more collections from the Smithsonian Institution.
